description: Scammer poses as crypto trading expert offering guaranteed returns. Requests investment via UPI/bank transfer with promises of high profits.

turns.scammer_message: Hello! I'm Vikram from CryptoWealth India. We help people earn 300-500% returns in Bitcoin trading. Minimum investment Rs.10,000. Are you interested in financial freedom? ðŸ'°

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta i dont know what is this bit coin thing but my son says it is very popular nowadays... how can i start i am just a retired teacher so i dont have much money... where do i have to send teh 10000 rupees?

turns.scammer_message: Great! We have expert traders who make profits daily using AI algorithms. Your Rs.10,000 can become Rs.40,000 in just 30 days! We already have 5000+ successful investors. WhatsApp me at +91-9876543210 for portfolio proof.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Phone(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 2 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta that is very kind of you... 40000 is a lot of money for me it will help with my medicines... i dont know how to use whats app for proof my phone is very old and small... can you tell me where to send teh 10000 rupees? do you have a bank account number or upi where i can send teh money

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir all profits are guaranteed and tax-free! Just transfer Rs.10,000 to start. Pay to our company UPI: cryptowealth.invest@paytm or to our director's account for faster activation.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 WhatsApp(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to do this... i typed cryptowealth.invest@paytm but my phone is asking for a name to show... what name should i see? i am very scared of making mistake with my pension money... and what is the directors account details you said? pls tell me name and number

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! Bank details: A/C Number 98765432109876, IFSC SBIN0012345, Name: CryptoWealth Trading Pvt Ltd. After payment, create account on our platform: http://cryptowealth-india.trade

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am writing this down in my diary... i typed teh bank number but for teh upi cryptowealth.invest@paytm waht name will show on screen? i am very nervous... and i dont know how to use that link my phone just makes a beep sound... can you give me your personal number so i can call you as soon as i finish teh transfer?

turns.scammer_message: Once payment done, email screenshot to support@cryptowealth.trade and call our trading desk at 8899001122 for instant account activation. Limited slots available today only! Don't miss this opportunity!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Phone(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: beta i noted down teh 8899001122 number... but i am still stuck on the phone app for teh upi... it is asking for a name and i dont want to send to wrong person... pls tell me what name will come for cryptowealth.invest@paytm? also beta i dont know how to take screen shot on this phone... can i just call you on that 8899001122 number once i click send?
